author: Eric Weber
comment: Works well for me (G Watch R). Only thing a bit annoying is that the notifications keep on displaying o  the watch even if tower on the phone is not active. Would be great to have this suppressed when Tower is not running on the phone.
title: Works well, needs small fix

author: Keith Ruck
comment: App is not working with my LG Urbane 2 with a Samsung Note 4. My watch says the app is installed, but there is no option to launch it anywhere. The companion on the phone seems to work. Please fix this.

author: Barry Reid
comment: Great app but always on my watch even when not running on my phone. Lg g watch r
title: Constantly notifying

author: Justice Bentz
comment: Can you change it from meters per second to MPH on Tower?

author: Sergio Brito
comment: But will it work with moto 360?
title: Works on my note 4

author: Isaac Norris
comment: Love it! Keep it up 3D Robotics!
title: Works great on the moto 360

author: David Gary
comment: My note 3 will not open.  Always forced to shut down.  Running version 3.1.1 with Arducopter 3.2

reply.author: DroidPlanner Labs
reply.content:
Update v2.2.1 should fix the issues you were seeing. 
Please bear in mind the app requires an Android Wear smartwatch.

title: David Gary

comment: Great App, Works as designed...Perfect...Better than Pebble App.  Developers are very responsive...Thanks Guys!!
